title: Inaccurate reporting on foot and mouth disease controls

content.text: There has been inaccurate media coverage regarding foot and mouth disease (FMD) controls with reports that it took six or seven days for controls on commercial imports to take effect and “allowed disease to enter the country.”
These claims are inaccurate. Our strict controls are designed to protect our borders from disease incursion, and we have taken the most stringent action possible to protect our farming sectors.
